title: The Sodium family
brief_description: The physical and chemical properties of the alkali metals are related to their atomic structures, and their compounds are shown through laboratory demonstrations including the rarely performed reaction between sodium and chlorine; the Downs Cell, Solvay process, salt formation by neutralisation, water softening and flame tests and a number of important new uses.
